title: I own Riot Kayle but haven't gotten a mystery gift or the icon, help?
body: I already own Riot Kayle. It sais I should be getting an icon and a mystery gift but I have not. Help?

replies.body: Gifts are being sent out individually so you may not have everything all at the same time, per our current [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  It will be ab it to send this out since there's so many eligible accounts.  Patience!
Is there anyway to refuse the gift? The popup forced me to take the dumb thing, and I don't want Kayle on my account -  yuck!

Kayle won't take it personally.  It's fine, message received.  {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} 

If you don't want a gift you received, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and request removal.  After a quick verification, we'll take it off!

Wanna ask this - why so many people reject kayle and how many times this already happened? :O

I mean i get that you might not like the character, but it' s not like you are forced to play her. she is even aram-viable!
Plus, among many different characters, why so obsessive towards Kayle? o-O i mean if she were urgoth i would have understood that because the jerk deserves it but she is not that terrible.
The gifts are still being distributed, with the 23rd being the final day. If you don't receive them by then, you can submit a support ticket.
